title: Screen flickering
body: Whenever im in game, or loading in, my screen starts flickering like crazy. I left game about 3 times to restart my league but it kept happening. is this an issue with the patch or whats happening?? this is the first time this is going on for me

replies.body: I would first make sure your graphics drivers are fully updated, then make sure there aren't any background programs that might be interfering like the windows game dvr and such. After that, be sure to check out the other steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to check some of the usual causes and try some of those fixes.
